title: Inside OpenAI's chaotic five days: How CEO Sam Altman was sacked, then snapped up by Microsoft, only for him to return to ChatGPT creators along with a new board

summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman was dismissed, leading to an employee revolt and a board shake-up. Altman, initially moving to Microsoft, returned as CEO as part of a dramatic five-day saga that involved key figures such as Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella and members of the OpenAI board. The power struggle centered on OpenAI's direction and AI safety, culminating in a restructured board with significant departures.
